title: Bluntman and Chronic: The Movie
description: The Holden McNeil and Banky Edwards comic comes to life as Bluntman and Chronic defend their Bluntcave against the menace Cock-Knocker.
quote: Any last words before I bust your balls, Bluntman?
parent: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
altHero: Mark Hamill as Cock-Knocker in fighting pose with one giant fist
alt1: James Van Der Beek and Jason Biggs dressed as Jay and Silent Bob
alt2: Jay and Silent Bob in superhero garb in a cave lair
alt3: Silent Bob holding a light saber
alt4: Cock-Knocker holds his giant fist up, looking menacing
